channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Meet Dot: DoorDash’s new 5-foot, 350-pound robot delivery driver that can hit 20 mph
item.description: Dot’s creators are convinced it's ready to take on the world despite its innocent look.

item.description: Department of Homeland Security adviser Corey Lewandowski says Immigrations and Custom Enforcement agents will be at Super Bowl 60.

item.title: Elon Musk’s big week, from spurring a Netflix cancelation wave to blowing out EV sales estimates; Tesla stock falls
item.description: Tesla stock closed Thursday down 4.5% to $439 amid skepticism the new number really signals a turnaround given all the anti-Musk backlash.

item.title: Spanberger, Earle-Sears battle over shutdown politics in Virginia's gubernatorial race
item.description: The political fallout from the government shutdown has crossed the Potomac River, injecting fresh tension into Virginia's gubernatorial race.

item.title: The Great Relearning
item.description: We are caught in a cycle of forgetting, then rediscovering, society’s most obvious lessons.

item.title: Your office might be noticeably empty on Oct. 3 thanks to Taylor Swift’s new album release, study shows
item.description: More than one-third of U.S. workers (36%) identify as a Swiftie, a BambooHR study shows.
